name: Forest Plague
description:
This forest has one key difference from the hundreds of other places. Here the HUNTER becomes the HUNTED. And animals here pose great danger.

For some reason, these animals aren’t afraid of humans anymore. Something - RADIATION? VIRUSES? DNA shift? - has made them too wild and bloodthirsty, so they will chase and devour you unless you protect yourself with a good deal of weapons.



You are to put an end to this forest plague. There is no other way:

  • SURVIVE the battle with animals that come in waves as long as you can;
  • PROTECT yourself with the most effective weapons;
  • FACE the bosses and use different boosters.

Forest Plague survival game key features:
  • Incredible top-down-shooter for thrill-seekers;
  • Hordes of aggressive animals;
  • Different mighty weapons;
  • Only one chance to survive in this chaos.

Get out alive and save the forest from this PLAGUE!
